name: Great Britain
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: Wider still and wider, shall my bounds be set!
attacked: Britain's never, never, never shall be slaves!
defeated: Alas, the sun has set on the British Empire.
introduction: We are pleased to meet you.
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in a trade agreement with Britain?
uniques: Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Renaissance era]>
